How We Do It

With dedicated focus on our clients, coupled with transparency and flexibility, SNM Canada Inc. cater to a broad range of services for our clients.

Scroll down to see the projects we were involved in during past years, and the services we offer, followed by a summary of our outreach.

OUR PROJECTS

Take a look at our past ventures!!

JUMP BACK TO HOME OUR SERVICES

Assisting with diverse aspects of sourcing

01.
Supplier & Buyer Verification

We help you connect with potential trading partners and evaluate collaboration compatibility.

02.
Pre-Shipment Assessment

We assess pre-requisites to help streamline your process during shipment preparation.

03.
Compliance & Quality Assurance

We assist in adhering to trade requirements, international laws, and quality considerations.

04.
Drafting Contracts & Letter of Credits

We draft legal documentation, and provide our seasoned guidance for commercial trade agreements. 

05.
Market Entrance Intermediation

We connect our partners with our longstanding network of buyers & sellers for cross-border expansion.

06.
Sustainable Routing Strategies

We support SDG aligned methods through optimized logistics & routes for sustainable procurement.

CONTACT US FOR MORE INFO OUR NETWORK

Expanding our global footprint for more alliances

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://snmcanada.com.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We prioritize reliable sourcing

SNM Canada Inc.

With decades of experience in connecting markets across continents, we specialize in sourcing sustainable products to fulfill your tailored requirements and specifications. 

MORE ABOUT US

Who We Are

Welcome to SNM Canada Inc.

25

YEARS OF EXPERIENCE

SNM Canada Inc., is a privately owned organization, with an accumulated experience of 25 years in the import/export and trade facilitation sector. 

Over the years, our operations have expanded across international borders, focusing on supplying from North America to meet the demands of South Asia.

And we endeavor to source the right products and suitable suppliers or manufacturers for you and your business.

DELIVERY PERFORMANCE 0% SUSTAINABLE SOURCING 0% CLIENT SATISFACTION 0% SEE OUR PORTFOLIO

HOW WE CAN HELP YOU

Global Sourcing

We specialize in sourcing suppliers and manufacturers for diverse range of sustainable products for specific needs, delivered with timely precision and smooth communication.

Real-Time Support

We provide ongoing support while maintaining open communication lines throughout and after each successful transaction.

Market Expansion

We aim to bridge communication gaps across continents for our clients to access unknown and untapped markets by utilizing our extensive knowledge of Asian, North American, and European trading trends & systems.

Payment Solutions

We serve as the trusted intermediary between sellers and buyers, offering flexible payment solutions beyond traditional Letter of Credits.

Shipment Inspection

We will have the right team ready to inspect all products before shipment, ensuring everything meets both seller and buyer standards with complete satisfaction.

Expert Consultancy

SNM Canada Inc. has crucial projects in the International trading and re-selling market over 25 years. We have come across various obstacles and our team has always come up with innovative solutions for the problems. We will find the right solution for you as well.

MORE ABOUT OUR SERVICES

Looking for reliable sourcing?
We are just a call away from a collaborative & sustainable partnership!

FREE CONSULTATION
24/7 HOUR AVAILABLE

+1 647 784 1377

Who We Work With

We have partnered a number of world renowned brands, of which few are listed below.

Along with our global associate, PROJUKTI International in Bangladesh, we have also represented the following Cancer Treatment Device manufacturing companies:

BEBIG Medical, Germany

Medico, Hungary

Best Theratronics Ltd., Canada

In addition, we represent Colenta Labortechnik GmbH, Austria, the manufacturer of Medical X-Ray equipment, both analogue and digital exposing system.

Email us to get a quote

Our Customer's Feedback

"SNM Canada helped us source equipment needed to finish building our boat. They accepted our LC payment and handled everything with the North American seller. They are consummate professionals who were always wary of our strict deadlines."

"I was particularly impressed with the level of expertise demonstrated by SNM Canada's staff. They were incredibly knowledgeable about the medical equipment industry and provided invaluable guidance through the entire process."

"Their extensive network and ability to procure exclusive medical equipment is exactly what we needed. Despite the challenges and limited availability in the market, their team worked tirelessly to find a suitable solution for us."

Specializing in sourcing suppliers and manufacturers for multitudes of products, based on your specific needs.

item.title: Journey
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
What We Do

SNM Canada Inc. is your trusted partner in international trade facilitation, specializing in connecting South Asian markets with premium suppliers and manufacturers from North America and the rest of the world.

We will be the intermediary for your payment, trading routes, paperwork, pre-shipment inspection and the shipment itself.

As we aim to source sustainable goods for the betterment of under-developed countries, we facilitate documentation and legislation in order to trade from global suppliers. As such, the Letter of Credit (LC) is not a preferred method of receiving payment for many North American and European exporters/manufacturers, and we are here to take care of that issue for both the importers and exporters.  OUR HISTORY

A journey from humble beginnings

 

SNM Canada Inc., began its journey on the docks of Chittagong, Bangladesh in 1990. Learning the art of international trading through the colossal behemoth that is the tea trade and export business.

Since then through numerous decades we have built on our previous knowledge and expanded globally once arriving on the shores of Canada in 2001.

Over the last decade SNM Canada has been focused on the international trading of medical equipment, recently branching out to garments, marine equipment and sensitive equipment for water management in South East Asia.

 

We excel in sourcing high-quality products across two critical sectors:

 

Medical Products & Equipment - Connecting healthcare providers with certified medical suppliers

Agricultural Products & Technology - Linking farming operations with advanced agricultural solutions

TAKE A LOOK AT OUR PROJECTS OUR VALUES

Towards building long-lasting partnerships

At SNM Canada Inc., we don't just facilitate demand and supply, we build long-lasting partnerships.

Our deep understanding of market entry and expansion, combined with our comprehensive service portfolio, can turn international trade simple, secure, and profitable for all parties involved.

Progressive
Client-Focused
Transparent

We are flexible, always adapting to the erratic dynamics of sourcing.

We deliver personalized service and dedicated support that makes international trade feel effortless and rewarding.

We prioritize a customer oriented approach to fulfill your requirements.

We turn your goals into our mission and we excel in navigating through the intricacies of reliable and sustainable sourcing.

We provide reliable sourcing solutions with complete clarity & trust.

\u00a0<\/p>

SNM Canada Inc., began its journey on the docks of Chittagong, Bangladesh in 1990. Learning the art of international trading through the colossal behemoth that is the tea trade and export business.<\/p>

Since then through numerous decades we have built on our previous knowledge and expanded globally once arriving on the shores of Canada in 2001.<\/p>

Over the last decade SNM Canada has been focused on the international trading of medical equipment, recently branching out to garments, marine equipment and sensitive equipment for water management in item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We are just a message away from a collaborative & sustainable partnership!!!

Send us a message or Request a quote!!

SNM Canada Inc.

  • +1 647 784 1377
  • +1 647 836 6252
  • Toll free: +1 647 784 1377
  • Mail us: infobd@snmcanada.com
